rows.label: bf03120100_0010
rows.name:
I'll go get some water.
What would you like, Vandham-san?

rows.label: bf03120100_0020
rows.name: I'll have a beer.

rows.label: bf03120100_0030
rows.name: Coming right up!

rows.label: bf03120100_0040
rows.name:
What's wrong? Does the food 
here not suit your taste?

rows.label: bf03120100_0050
rows.name: Do you also fight in wars, Vandham-san?

rows.label: bf03120100_0060
rows.name:
Do you have something 
against mercenaries?

rows.label: bf03120100_0070
rows.name: Are you going to recruit us?

rows.label: bf03120100_0080
rows.name:
Hah!
We aren't desperate enough to recruit children.

rows.label: bf03120100_0090
rows.name: Don't worry about it.

rows.label: bf03120100_0100
rows.name: Oh, that's good then.

rows.label: bf03120100_0110
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hmmm...

rows.label: bf03120100_0120
rows.name:
Rex, you're a salvager, 
aren't you?

rows.label: bf03120100_0130
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: bf03120100_0140
rows.name:
Among the things salvagers pull up,
there are a lot of military supplies?

rows.label: bf03120100_0150
rows.name: What do you think about that?

rows.label: bf03120100_0160
rows.name: I don't wanna get involved with it.

rows.label: bf03120100_0170
rows.name: It's all the same.

rows.label: bf03120100_0180
rows.name:
Compasses, valves for ether stoves...
Armies need all these things.

rows.label: bf03120100_0190
rows.name:
That bread you're eating? It's made from ruska
flour. Supplied by the Superbian government.

rows.label: bf03120100_0200
rows.name: This world's full of war.

rows.label: bf03120100_0210
rows.name:
Living in this world as long as you 
have connections with others

rows.label: bf03120100_0220
rows.name:
that means you're 
contributing to the war.

rows.label: bf03120100_0230
rows.name: Am I wrong?

rows.label: bf03120100_0240
rows.name: That's...

rows.label: bf03120100_0250
rows.name:
Living is, you know,
the most cruel thing.

rows.label: bf03120100_0260
rows.name:
To protect my precious people from that cruelty,
I created this mercenary group.

rows.label: bf03120100_0270
rows.name: Rex. You're the Driver of the Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf03120100_0280
rows.name:
War will always follow you around,
and never leave your side.

rows.label: bf03120100_0290
rows.name:
What can you do in that situation? 
How will you live?

rows.label: bf03120100_0300
rows.name:
Running away is easy. All you'd have 
to do is abandon that girl.

rows.label: bf03120100_0310
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf03120100_0320
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: bf03120100_0330
rows.name: Let's go. Get ready.

rows.label: bf03120100_0340
rows.name: Wh-where are we going?

rows.label: bf03120100_0350
rows.name: Just follow me.
